mapper.insert: insert into question(uid, content, introduction, tag, agreeCount, comment, answer, follower, viewCount, collectCount, createDate) values(#{uid}, #{content}, #{introduction}, #{tag}, #{agreeCount}, #{comment}, #{answer}, #{follower}, #{viewCount}, #{collectCount}, #{createDate})
mapper.update: create table #{id}_question_comment (id int(20) auto_increment primary key, uid int(20), content varchar(200), agree int(20), toWho int(20), createDate date)

create table #{id}_question_answer (id int(20) auto_increment primary key, uid int(20), questionId int(20), content varchar(200), agree int(20), comment varchar(20), collection int(20), createDate date )
mapper.select:
select * from question
and tag like concat('%', #{tag}, '%')

select * from question
and content like concat('%', #{content}, '%')
select * from question where content = #{content} and uid = #{uid}
mapper.update: update question set agree_count=agree_count+1 where id=#{questionId}
update question set viewCount=viewCount+1 where id=#{questionId}
update question set collectCount=collectCount+1 where id=#{questionId}
